content: this is my simple all in one christmas hat pattern it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts it is versatile in that you can also add on your favourite adornments such as bells or your own fluffy pompoms if you choose there are two sizes available for you to choose from the largest hat uses 17 metres 19 yarns of yarn and measures 6cm x 6cm 2 1/2 inches the smaller hat measures 5cm x 5 cm 2 inches any size yarn and hook can be used great project to use up your scrap balls of yarn too please see my other all in one patterns
